price: Sε naadaasԑm bi firi ͻbonsam hͻ bԑdaadaa wo a, hwehwε ntwitwagyeε firi Nyankopͻn hͻ. Nokorε sε Ɔne mpaebͻ Tiefoͻ no, na Ɔne Onimdefoͻ no.
arabic: وَإِمَّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ نَزۡغٞ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-immā yanzaghannaka mina al-shayṭāni nazghun fa-is'taʿidh bil-lahi innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
